list.name: STICKY-SYRUP-MIXER
list.description: Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.
list.descriptionHtml: Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.

list.name: HERBAL-TONIC
list.description: Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for x health per second.
list.descriptionHtml: Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for x health per second.
